itemDescription: British and Greek general and Greek politician

wikipedia_page.main: Sir Richard Church  (Greek: Ριχάρδος/Ρίτσαρντ Τσούρτς/Τσωρτς;  23 February 1784 – 20 March 1873) was a British military officer in the British Army and commander of the Greek forces during the last stages of the Greek War of Independence after 1827. After Greek independence, he became a general in the Hellenic Army and a member of the Greek Senate.
